summary: A young boy in a remote medieval outpost under siege from barbarian raids is beckoned to adventure when a celebrated master illuminator arrives with an ancient book, brimming with secret wisdom and powers.
cast: Evan McGuire|Christen Mooney|Brendan Gleeson|Mick Lally|Liam Hourican|Paul Tylak|Michael McGrath|Paul Young|Nora Twomey|Alli McCann|Clair Funchion|Conor O'Halloran|Gaelle Hersent|Marie Thorhauge|Sean Lennon|Jonas Till Hoffmann|James O'Halloran|Fabian Erlinghauser|Kairen Waloch
title: El secreto del libro de Kells
